name: Responsive Contact Form Mailchimp Extension
author: August Infotech

sections.description:
We provide advance level of support for installation and customization at $10/hour.

Click here for more information

Please install and activate Responsive Contact Form before using Responsive Contact Form Mailchimp Extension : Visit Plugin Link

Contact Us Form is a simple WordPress plugin that generates a responsive contact form on your website or blog. Mailchimp Extension provides you the way to add your leads to your mailchimp account.

To connect the Responsive Contact Form to a MailChimp account, a valid MailChimp API Key is needed. Add the MailChimp API Key and click “Save Changes” to continue. You will be prompted with list of your mailchimp lists. Check the mailchimp list to which you want to subscribe your leads and save changes.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip our archive and upload the entire Responsive Contact Form Mailchimp Extension directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Set your MailChimp API key in the plugin settings.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version.

1.1

  • Resolve mailchimp list export bug.

1.2

  • Fetch name in mailchimp extension.

upgrade_notice:
• Upgrade Notice Notification
  • Fixed issue of deleting record and on uninstallallation deletion of all fields data and table.
  • Fixed the issue of textarea focus in the middle.
  • Added message from user in database and displayed in admin.
  • Compatible in wordpress 3.8

  • Mailchimp 3 API compatiable
